targets.rawSql: SELECT SrcCountry as country, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND SrcCountry != '' GROUP BY SrcCountry ORDER BY total_bytes DESC
SELECT SrcCountry, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND SrcCountry != '' GROUP BY SrcCountry ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT DstCountry, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND DstCountry != '' GROUP BY DstCountry ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT $__timeInterval(TimeReceived) as time, sum(Bytes) as cross_border_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND SrcCountry != DstCountry AND SrcCountry != '' AND DstCountry != '' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
